titles.title: While I Was Praying, Somebody Touched Me

verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
While I was praying, somebody touched me.
While I was praying, somebody touched me.
While I was praying, somebody touched me.
I know it was the hand of the Lord.

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
Glory, glory, glory somebody touched me (3x)
Must have been the hand of the Lord.
While I was singing, somebody touched me (3x)
I know it was the hand of the Lord.
Glory, glory, glory somebody touched me (3x)
Must have been the hand of the Lord.
While I was praising, somebody touched me (3x)
I know it was the hand of the Lord.
Glory, glory, glory somebody touched me (3x)
